FlightController¶

class components.electronics.flightcontroller.FlightController(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

This class will create the Navio2 flight controller geometry. The dimensions are at https://emlid.com/navio/ .

Returns:ParaPy Geometry of the flight computer
center_of_gravity[source]¶

This attribute returns the COG of the flight controller.

Returns:ParaPy Point
Return type:ParaPy Point
component_type[source]¶

This attribute names the component ‘flightcontroller’ for flight controller.

Returns:String with flightcontroller’s component name
Return type:str
flight_controller_power[source]¶

This attribute estimates the Navio2 flight computer power. It is found by multiplying the average voltage (5V), by the average current (150mA). Source: https://emlid.com/navio/

Returns:Flight Computer Power
Return type:float
flightcontroller_offset[source]¶

This creates the geometry of the flight controller. FOR BOX FUNCTION: Width is x direction, length is y direction, height is z direction.

Returns:ParaPy Flight Controller Geometry
Return type:Box
h_navio[source]¶

The flight controller height is to be oriented parallel with the y axis. This height was assumed from their figure.

Returns:ParaPy Flight Controller height
Return type:float
internal_shape[source]¶

This obtains a bounding box of the flight controller to size the fuselage frames.

Returns:Navio2 Shape
Return type:ScaledShape
l_navio[source]¶
The 65mm length of the Flight Computer is the longest dimension and is to be oriented parallel with the x
axis.
Returns:ParaPy Flight Controller Length
Return type:float
label[source]¶

This labels the flight controller ‘Avionics’

Returns:Avionics Label
Return type:str
solid[source]¶

This shifts the shape to the correct place with respect to the local axis system.

Returns:ParaPy Flight Controller Geometry
Return type:TranslatedShape
w_navio[source]¶

The 55mm width is to be oriented parallel with the y axis.

Returns:ParaPy Flight Controller Width
Return type:float
weight[source]¶

The mass of the Navio2 flight computer is 23 grams.

Returns:Navio2 Mass
Return type:float
